definition: to store/to save/to have in reserve/heir/Taiwan pr. [chu2]
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
standpipe (firefighting water storage system for a building)

sentences.english: The second part of the solar water heater holds the water for the system.
sentences.chinese: 太陽能熱水器的另一部分爲儲水系統。

sentences.english: Every apartment house has a water tank on its roof.
sentences.chinese: 每棟公寓屋子都有一個儲水塔。

sentences.english: Press down pop-up to close drainage. lift.
sentences.chinese: 落水頭壓下，排杆關閉，面盆儲水。

sentences.english: They started a campaign to save water.
sentences.chinese: 他們開始了一項儲水的運動。

sentences.english: Just for your kind information, rotomolding grade is used in making water storage tanks.
sentences.chinese: 只要您的實物資料，滾塑級是用來儲水罐。

sentences.english: Two rubber pipes are attached to the water storage tank.
sentences.chinese: 兩個橡膠管連接到儲水罐。

sentences.english: High-temperature solar hot water cylinder belongs to water-storing area.
sentences.chinese: 高溫太陽能熱水筒屬於儲水筒領域。

sentences.english: Super high-temperature hot water cylinder belongs to water-storing area.
sentences.chinese: 特高溫熱水筒屬於儲水筒領域。

definition: inner product/the dot product of two vectors
to eliminate dust (i.e. filter out suspended particles)
